channel.title: Need help making ::Starter and making default clothing when people start
channel.description: Need help making ::starter and making like default clothing wehen new players start =]! plz help i wana make a goooood server.......

item.title: Need help making ::Starter and making default clothing when people start
item.dc:creator: @bayram1995 bayram1995
item.description:
@bayram1995 wrote:

Go into client.java and search for 2253, then u see something like this:

[code] else if (NPCID == 2253) { /Rich guy/
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
if((cluelevel == 1) && (cluestage == 5) && (clueid == 2))
{
NpcWanneTalk = 32;
}
else
{
sendMessage(“This man isn’t interested in talking right now…”);
}

			}[/code]

Under the last } copy this:

else if((NPCID == 2567) && starter == 0){

	try {
		addItem(995, 50000000);
		sendMessage("You received the CE-SA Scape Starter Pack!");
		messageToAll = playerName+ "has received the CE-SA Scape Starter Pack! Get yours by talking to wise old man!";
		starter = 1;
		BufferedWriter bw = null;
	bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/starter.txt", true));
	bw.write(""+playerName+"");
	bw.newLine();
	bw.flush();
		}
	catch(IOException ioexception) {
			misc.println("starter.txt: error loading file.");
		}
	}


else if((NPCID == 2567) && starter == 1){

		sendMessage("Maybe I'm old, but you can't scam me!");
		sendMessage("You are already received the starter pack!!");
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has tried to scam wise old man! All kill him!";
}

Search checkbannedusers(); in client.java and then u see something like this:

[code]checkbannedusers();
checkbannedips();

if(checkbannedusers() == 5) {
returnCode = 4;
System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because they are banned.");
appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because they are banned.");
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
}
if(checkbannedips() == 5) {
returnCode = 4;
System.out.println(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned.");
appendToLR(playerName+" failed to logon because their ip is banned.");
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
}[/code]

Under checkbannedips(); add this:[code]

checkstarter();
if (checkstarter() == 5)
starter = 1;
if (checkstarter() == 0)
starter = 0;

[/code]

Search public int checkbannedips() in client.java and under the last } add this:

public int checkstarter() { try { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/starter.txt")); String data = null; while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) { return 5; } } } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while checking starters.!"); e.printStackTrace(); } return 0; }

Open NPCHandler.java and copy this under a script like this one:


if (npcs[i].npcType == 2567) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "Talk to me to get your CE-SA Scape Starter Pack!";
}
}

Now open autospawn.cfg and add this:

spawn = 2567	XXXX	YYYY	0	0	0	0	0	1	wiseoldman

Now save and compile.
U did it!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making ::Starter and making default clothing when people start

item.title: Need help making ::Starter and making default clothing when people start
item.dc:creator: @Dynamik Dynamik
item.description:
@Dynamik wrote:

[quote=“99str3ngth99, post:3, topic:218033”]ok for starter use this

[quote]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 15000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
addItem(892, 1500);
sendMessage(“MESSAGE HERE”);
starter = 1;
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already received your starter pack !”);
}
}
[/quote]

and to change ur starting armour you click on player and type ctrl+f and search for playerhat

then you just change the starting armour to want you want

then you compile and restart your server[/quote]

Not quite jus that.
You also need to declare public int starter = 0;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making ::Starter and making default clothing when people start

item.title: Need help making ::Starter and making default clothing when people start
item.dc:creator: @99str3ngth99 99str3ngth99
item.description:
@99str3ngth99 wrote:

ok for starter use this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 15000000); addItem(392, 1500); addItem(892, 1500); sendMessage("*MESSAGE HERE*"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }

and to change ur starting armour you click on player and type ctrl+f and search for playerhat

then you just change the starting armour to want you want

then you compile and restart your server
